item.title: Navigation with Nested Controllers in Compose
item.description: What My (probably over-engineered) solution for navigation events in jetpack compose, following the UDF principles. Instead of handling the navigation directly in the UI, by passing NavControllers around to child composables so they can invoke navigate on the controller, a cleaner and more idiomatic and a Unidirectional-Data-Flow-y way of doing that would be using viewmodel events.
